entry.title: otaku0304/Internationalization: Angular i18n SPA Demo is a lightweight, multilingual Single Page Application built with Angular. Designed as a showcase for Angular's internationalization (i18n) capabilities, this demo highlights best practices for building scalable, localized web applications. The application supports English (en), Dutch (nl), and Serbian (sr),
entry.content: Angular i18n SPA Demo is a lightweight, multilingual Single Page Application built with Angular. Designed as a showcase for Angular's internationalization (i18n) capabilities, this demo highlights best practices for building scalable, localized web applications. The application supports English (en), Dutch (nl), and Serbian (sr),

entry.title: martinSCS/ZhEnTextFormatter: A lightweight JavaScript plugin that automatically inserts invisible breaks between Chinese and English characters to improve text readability in mixed-language content. Perfect for web pages that feature CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean) and English text, ensuring a clean and user-friendly layout.
entry.content: A lightweight JavaScript plugin that automatically inserts invisible breaks between Chinese and English characters to improve text readability in mixed-language content. Perfect for web pages that feature CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean) and English text, ensuring a clean and user-friendly layout.

entry.title: Nexacore-Org/ByteChain-Academy: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.
entry.content: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.
